questions_and_answers.question: give me the parent login website for Autonomous/VTU?
questions_and_answers.answer: the login website for parent login website for Autonomous/VTU is http://parent-login.nmamit.in

questions_and_answers.question: what are the e-resources provided by VTU for the students?
questions_and_answers.answer: Facilities provided by VTU are VTU e-Shikshana Programme, E-Content, E-Resources for further details visit http://elearning.vtu.ac.in/esk3.php, http://nptel.vtu.ac.in/econtent, http://elearning.vtu.ac.in/e-Res.php

questions_and_answers.question: what are the e-resources provided by NMAMIT for the students
questions_and_answers.answer: Moodle, CAEG Youtube channel(1st year subject) http://guru.nmamit.in, http://youtube.com/nmamit/mechanical
